meanings.sent1: The playground was filled with happy sprogs playing together.
meanings.sent2: The teacher read a story to the sprogs before nap time.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous sprogs decided to have a silly dance-off in the classroom.
meanings.sent4: The garden bloomed with colorful flowers, attracting sprogs like bees to nectar.
meanings.sent5: The little sprogs giggled and chased each other around the yard, full of energy.

meanings.definition: To give birth to or produce offspring.
meanings.sent1: The rabbit sprogs welcomed a litter of tiny bunnies into the burrow.
meanings.sent2: The apple tree sprogs bore delicious fruit every autumn.
meanings.sent3: The farmer's cow sprogs were a surprise addition to the herd.
meanings.sent4: The factory sprogs churned out toys at a rapid pace.
meanings.sent5: The hen proudly sprogs a new chick, clucking happily in the coop.
